content.rendered:
Product Development Manager – Jersey

Job Context

Dongyi Sourcing Limited (DSL) is a multinational apparel buying hub and exporter. The organization is marching ahead with a vision to deliver world-class service, quality solutions and value-added services to end products for the textile industries. DSL is committed to achieve global level, beginning from fabrics to fashion through market knowledge and experienced sourcing professionals. Global headquarter of Dongyi sourcing is located at North Point, Hong Kong and Global corporate office is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Dongyi Sourcing Ltd is searching potential candidates for Product Development Manager – Jersey position.

 

Job Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain the product roadmap, aligning with company strategy and goals.

  • Conduct market research to identify new opportunities and understand competitive landscape.

  • Define product vision, strategy, and objectives.

  • Lead and manage the product development lifecycle from concept to launch.

  • Create and manage project timelines, ensuring projects are completed on time and within budget.

  • Coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful product delivery.

  • Work with design and engineering teams to develop product specifications and requirements.

  • Oversee the design process, ensuring the product is user-friendly and meets market demands.

  • Conduct product testing and quality assurance to ensure the highest standards.

  • Collaborate with stakeholders including marketing, sales, and customer support to ensure product success.

  • Communicate product progress and updates to senior management and other stakeholders.

  • Gather feedback from customers and stakeholders to continuously improve the product.

  • Perform ongoing market analysis to stay ahead of industry trends.

  • Gather and analyze customer feedback and data to inform product decisions.

  • Use insights to adjust product strategy and development priorities.

  • Develop and manage the product development budget.

  • Ensure resources are allocated effectively and costs are controlled.

  • Ensure products comply with relevant regulations and standards.

  • Identify and mitigate risks associated with product development.

Employment Status

  • Full-time

Educational Requirements

  • Textile Graduated from a renowned University

 

Experience Requirements

  • At least 10 years

  • The applicants should have experience in the following area(s):

    RMG, Multinational Buying office, Trading office.

Additional Requirements

  • Age limit 38 years.
  • Must be fluent in English writing and speaking.
  • Must have advance skill on MS Excel, MS Word & MS Power Point.

Job Location

Dhaka (Uttara)

Salary

Negotiable

Compensation & Other Benefits

  • Mobile bill

  • Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize

  • Salary Review: Yearly

  • Festival Bonus: 2

  • Performance bonus

  • On-time salary – Current month’s salary is paid in current monthly only (last working day of each month)

  • Health Insurance

  • Medical Insurance

  • Long-term benefits

  • PF

If you are passionate to good fit for the position please send your updated CV to

career@dongyi.hk

by 14th July 2024

Note: Please Mention the Position Name in Email Subject.
